tool_description: Easily scrape website links, headings, ... in a structured JSON-encoded format.
name: Premium Website Scraper
title: Premium Website Scraper

api_list.name: premium_website_scraper__get
api_list.description: An overview of the Premium Website Scraper. Please Try Out to get some more information in the response!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://premium-website-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "premium-website-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://premium-website-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "premium-website-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: scrape_title_title_get
scrape_url_links_links_get
api_list.description:
Extracts all links and associated texts from the requested url to deeper inspect websites and get an overview of links. 

Are you wondering about the API links-results? Often, there is javascript enabled, which limits most content extractors. 
Use the optional "js" parametter to extract content from websites with js, such as amazon!

schema.title: Response Scrape Url Links Links Get

items.title: url_link
items.description: An object containing information about website links.

api_list.name: scrape_headings_headings_get
api_list.description:
Extracts all headings from the website. 

Are you wondering about the API links-results? Often, there is javascript enabled, which limits most content extractors. 
Use the optional "js" parametter to extract content from websites with js, such as amazon!

schema.title: headings
schema.description: An object with headings of the website.

api_list.name: scrape_images_images_get
api_list.description:
Extracts all images from the website and returns the associated links, texts and dimensions. 

Are you wondering about the API links-results? Often, there is javascript enabled, which limits most content extractors. 
Use the optional "js" parametter to extract content from websites with js, such as amazon!
